title: Refining Felicity
description: Elderly Amy and Effy Tribble, mannish and simpering opposites, advertise to refine "a Wild, Unruly or Undisciplined Daughter" for a London Season, aided by returned nabob Mr Haddon. Lady Felicity Vane 19, unwilling client, lures unwitting Lord James Bremmer. Lord Ravenswood 30s quietly donates his town furnishings and servants despite his fianc√©e Betty.
author: Marion Chesney
